com.github.kaisle.util

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaisle.util.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has some useful utility methods, for instance a method for saving a JDOM-Document to a file.
    Author:
    Anders Borum

      • saveDocumentToFile

        public static void saveDocumentToFile(org.jdom2.Document document,
                                      java.lang.String path)
        Save a JDOM document to a file given by the specified path.
        Parameters:
        document - The document that should be saved.
        path - The path that the document should be saved to.

      • getSteamIdFromName

        public static java.lang.String getSteamIdFromName(java.lang.String name)
        Get a steam-account-id from a vanity name. Only some players have vanity names. The vanity name will be the name included in their profile-link at steamcommunity.com. For instance, the player with the steam-profile-link http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/Dendi will have the vanity name Dendi. The alternative to a vanity name URL is a URL with a number representing their 64-bit account-id, e.g. http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198047462618.
        Parameters:
        name - The player's vanity name.
        Returns:
        The player's id.

      • searchNickname

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> searchNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        Search for a player by a nickname/persona-name. The players that match are returned in a HashMap, containing their names and id's.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The player's nickname/persona-name, eg. Sing-Sing.
        Returns:
        A map of the matches, containing the names and id's.

      • isProfilePrivate

        public static boolean isProfilePrivate(java.lang.String accountID)
        Test whether a player has shared his or her match data.
        Parameters:
        accountID - The 32-bit or 64-bit steam-account-id of the player.
        Returns:
        True if the has not shared match-data, false if he has.

      • getMatches

        public static java.util.List<MatchResponseDetails> getMatches(java.lang.String searchString)
        Get a list of matches based on either a persona-name, a 64 or 32-bit steam-account-id or a steamcommunity profile-link. If there are several people with the given persona-name, those names are printed out with their respective steam-account-id's and null is returned.
        Parameters:
        searchString - The string that should be searched.
        Returns:
        A list of the last 500 matches for the player.

      • getPlayerInfo

        public static PlayerDetails getPlayerInfo(java.lang.String accountID)
        Get the steam profile details of a player.
        Parameters:
        accountID - The player's account id.
        Returns:
        A PlayerDetails object containing the details.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
